creator: conor@apache.org
text:
That <java> task may be using wads of memory in Ant's VM even if your build file
is small. In other words, memory usage and build file size are not strongly
correlated.

Try forking the <java> task and see if things improve. Alternatively allocate
more memory to Ant's VM.

creator: pankajs@tpt.com
text: It was resolved after increasing the buffer size for the command prompt on W2K
